title: (Tues Full) Bobby on Experts Saying It’s Bad To Tell Your Kids to ‘Dream Big’ + Lunchbox Wants People to CLEAR his List + How Would We Spend 10k in 3 Hours? + The ‘2-2-2’ Rule is the Key to a Happy Marriage
itunes:title: (Tues Full) Bobby on Experts Saying It’s Bad To Tell Your Kids to ‘Dream Big’ + Lunchbox Wants People to CLEAR his List + How Would We Spend 10k in 3 Hours? + The ‘2-2-2’ Rule is the Key to a Happy Marriage
description:
Bobby shares why experts are saying not to tell your kids to ‘dream big’. We share how our parents encouraged us growing up and the parents on the show share what they tell their kids now. Lunchbox shares a ridiculous request he has for the show. Bobby puts a new stipulation on Lunchbox wanting to get us to play in the lottery. That leads us to sharing how we would spend a winning of $10k in 3 hours.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
